name: Chernoboll
description:
Disclaimer! Game is in development , expect bugs , lag and unpolished gamplay art and animations

Made by Player11132

Art by manacharge

Welcome to the chernobool nuclear power plant!

Your job is to maintain the nuclear reactor number 4

By that I mean to control the energy output level and atom level,

heat and pressure  (Heat and pressure not implemented sorry i guess)

Also try to keep the levles avarage.

Energy output is modifying by the atom level and

the pressure by the heat.

To destroy atoms use the rods and to create more use the laser (Left click)

The heat level is controlled by the valve in the down right corner (not implemented)

Now that you know what to do go to work.

And good luck!
